TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OlActionCopyLike extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how item properties will be copied.

remarks.para: Used by the property of an to specify how item properties will be copied to the new item that is created when the Action is executed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlActionCopyLike olForward = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Properties of the new item will be set such that the new item is a forward of the original item. If creating a new , the value of the To and CC properties in the new item will be empty and the Subject property of the new item will be the original Subject with a prefix such as "FW:" (see property) added. The attachments on the original item will be copied to the new item.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlActionCopyLike olReply = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Properties of the new item will be set such that the new item is a reply to the original item. If creating a new , the value of the original To field will be copied to the SenderEmailAddress property of the new item, the CC field will be blank and the Subject field of the new item will be the original Subject with a prefix such as "RE:" (see property) added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlActionCopyLike olReplyAll = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Properties of the new item will be set such that the new item is a reply to all of the senders of the original item. If creating a new , the value of the SenderEmailAddress and CC properties will be copied to the To property of the new item and the Subject property of the new item will be the Subject of the original item with a prefix such as "RE:" (see property) added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlActionCopyLike olReplyFolder = int32(3)

Docs.summary: If creating a new based on an old one, the Post To property of the new item will contain the active folder address, the Subject property of the original item will be copied to the ConversationTopic property of the new item, and the Subject property of the new item will be empty.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlActionCopyLike olRespond = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Used exclusively for voting button actions.
